title: The Christian Scholar
additional-note: A 1987 renewal for the 1959 book 'Religion and Culture: Essays in Honor of Paul Tillich' notes that chapter 25 originally appeared in the Christian Scholar.  That chapter, 'The Spiritual Significance of the United Nations', was published there in 1955, so the 1987 book renewal is too late to cover it.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
